plans could be made by the league to postpone or cancel games.
NBA官方已經通知各隊因為武漢肺炎(或稱新冠肺炎)的爆發，聯盟有可能做出臨時性的延賽
或停賽的決定。

There can also be scenarios where games will be played with no fans, media etc,
with only essential staff present.
也有可能會有比賽禁止開放球迷、媒體等進場，球場中只會留有必要人員在場。

This memo was sent after Steve Clifford, head coach of the Orlando Magic felt il
l mid game tonight and left to be examined by doctors in Minnesota.

即送醫後被送出。
